QuestData.Title: The Replacements
QuestData.Description: My guys are all on the injured roster! Our shredders are all kaput! The ref is about to call the game!$B$BIt's down to the wire and I need you, $n!!!$B$BLet's get one of these shredders in working condition. There are replacement parts all over Bilgewater Port. Any green-blooded Kezanian will gladly let you have them if there's a chance that the Buccaneers will win.$B$BWe'll show those no-good Steamwheedle Sharks how to play footbomb!
QuestData.RewardText: That's my $g boy : girl;! Now to get one of these useless hunks of metal in working order and you into the game!
